meanings.definition: The act or process of changing in form or nature.
meanings.sent1: A mutation in the plant caused its leaves to turn purple.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how mutation occurs in cells to understand genetic diseases.
meanings.sent3: The mutation in the recipe turned the cake into a savory dish instead of sweet.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden mutation in behavior left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent5: The mutation of the caterpillar into a butterfly is a beautiful transformation.

meanings.definition: A sudden departure from the parent type in one or more heritable characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The genetic mutation resulted in the offspring having a unique color pattern.
meanings.sent2: The mutation in the gene caused the child to have a rare disorder.
meanings.sent3: The mutation in the family tree revealed an unexpected relative.
meanings.sent4: The mutation in the population of birds led to a new species evolving.
meanings.sent5: The sudden mutation in the virus made it more contagious.
